DOC.brief_summary: This Phase 1 , randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled study evaluate safety , tolerability pharmacokinetics two , single intravenous ( IV ) high dos MHAA4549A compare placebo administer healthy volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: A Study High Dose MHAA4549A Healthy Volunteers
